definitions: Committing money or capital to an endeavor with the expectation of obtaining an additional income or profit.
Devoting one's time, effort, or energy to a particular undertaking with the expectation of a worthwhile result.
Formally conferring a title, office, or power on someone.
examples: She is investing in real estate.
He is investing a lot of time into his new hobby.
The queen is investing the new knight.
